    • Uses of Topic in com.google.cloud.pubsub

      Methods in com.google.cloud.pubsub that return Topic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Topic Topic.Builder.build() 
      Topic PubSub.create(TopicInfo topic)
      Creates a new topic.
      Topic PubSub.getTopic(String topic)
      Returns the requested topic or null if not found.
      Topic Topic.reload()
      Fetches current topic's latest information.
      Methods in com.google.cloud.pubsub that return types with arguments of type Topic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<Topic> PubSub.createAsync(TopicInfo topic)
      Sends a request for creating a topic.
      Future<Topic> PubSub.getTopicAsync(String topic)
      Sends a request for getting a topic.
      Page<Topic> PubSub.listTopics(PubSub.ListOption... options)
      Lists the topics.
      Future<AsyncPage<Topic>> PubSub.listTopicsAsync(PubSub.ListOption... options)
      Sends a request for listing topics.
      Future<Topic> Topic.reloadAsync()
      Sends a request to fetch current topic's latest information.
